## Replacing NA's by predefined value


```{r echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(recipes)

```

```{r echo=FALSE}

data("credit_data")

str(credit_data)
summary(credit_data)
```
### Replacing all NA's in data frame by choosed value.

```{r}

credit_data_allnas <- credit_data[is.na(credit_data), is.factor(colnames(credit_data))]

```
